title: English-Chinese translator②
input1: "我今天去商店买了一些水果和蔬菜。"
input2: "这个周末我计划和朋友们一起去爬山，享受大自然的美丽。"
input1_ans: "I went to the store today to buy some fruits and vegetables."
"I went to the store today to buy some fruits and vegetables."
input2_ans: "This weekend, I plan to go hiking with my friends and enjoy the beauty of nature."
"This weekend, I plan to go hiking with my friends and enjoy the beauty of nature."
